about_the_game:
Time to inject some excitement, sex appeal and humour into your gaming! It's time to say goodbye to shining gems, cutesy gardens, ageing dragons and tedious quests. Say hello to double-D measurements, triple-X ratings, bombshell actresses, and a healthy dose of adult humour!

Build an adult empire! - Become the greatest pimp Pornwood's ever seen by taking to the streets and bringing a world of hurt to your competition. Claim their patch and their girls. Invest in real estate to ensure all those lonely sailors, “handy”-men and pizza delivery guys get plenty of bang for their buck! But be warned: You're not the only pimp in town who wants to make it big!

- Work your way up the food chain by giving a hand or two.

- Take on the adult film industry.

- Create your real estate empire.

- Rule the streets & the red lights while you manage your team.

- Build the most powerful gang in town to protect your investments!


Warning: Gameplay contains a lot of satire & parody. Oh right, and some nudity...

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains explicit & non explicit sexual material with animations showing solo female, male/female and female/female sexual intercourse and/or innuendos. 

All characters in the game are adults and every situation has full consent from both sides. The game is a parody of the adult industry & underworld.

Some parts of the game depict parts of the underworld such as prostitution (both male and female - all with full consent), drug dealing and running gangs. 

The game also features light alcohol and drug consumption.
